ModMetaData.name: HaulPriorityLite
ModMetaData.author: Renzo471
ModMetaData.description: Simple mod to manually increase the priority of hauling for the selected items and also adds an unforbid designator. Update of the original by Gaesatae https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=9328.0 Version: 1.0.1 a13
